tool_description:
Real-time data, unofficial API asos.com
Asos is a leading online fashion and style destination worldwide. 
Asos provides a comprehensive online platform for shoppers to discover and shop for diverse and unique fashion products.
This API offers a range of fashion categories for both men and women, including clothing, footwear, accessories, swimwear, lingerie, and more.
name: Asos com
title: Asos com

api_list.name: products/search
api_list.description: Search for products based on the entered search key

optional_parameters.name: range
optional_parameters.description:
Get from **/filters/range** endpoint, data[index]->id
The range is separated by a comma (if selecting multiple)
E.g:  new_season,sale

optional_parameters.name: activity
optional_parameters.description:
Get from **/filters/activity** endpoint, data[index]->id
The activity is separated by a comma (if selecting multiple)
E.g: 70023,70022

optional_parameters.name: design
optional_parameters.description:
Get from **/filters/design** endpoint, data[index]->id
The design is separated by a comma (if selecting multiple)
E.g:  61375,61443

optional_parameters.name: discount
optional_parameters.description:
Get from **/filters/discount** endpoint, data[index]->id
The discount is separated by a comma (if selecting multiple)
E.g:  1,2

optional_parameters.name: body_fit
optional_parameters.description:
Get from **/filters/body-fit** endpoint, data[index]->id
The body_fit is separated by a comma (if selecting multiple)
E.g:  60769,63004

optional_parameters.name: product_type
optional_parameters.description:
Get from **/filters/product-type** endpoint, data[index]->id
The product_type is separated by a comma (if selecting multiple)
E.g: 8606,8415

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description:
Get from **/filters/category** endpoint, data[index]->id
The category is separated by a comma (if selecting multiple)
E.g:  61384,61379

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description:
Get from **/filters/size** endpoint, data[index]->id
The size is separated by a comma (if selecting multiple)
E.g:  118,74

optional_parameters.name: brand
optional_parameters.description:
Get from **/filters/brand** endpoint, data[index]->id
The brand is separated by a comma (if selecting multiple)
E.g:  53,15719

optional_parameters.name: color
optional_parameters.description:
Get from **/filters/color** endpoint, data[index]->id
The color is separated by a comma (if selecting multiple)
E.g:  4,17

optional_parameters.name: sleeve_length
optional_parameters.description:
Get from **/filters/sleeve-length** endpoint, data[index]->id
The sleeve_length is separated by a comma (if selecting multiple)
E.g: 50477,61439

optional_parameters.name: style
optional_parameters.description:
Get from **/filters/style** endpoint, data[index]->id
The style is separated by a comma (if selecting multiple)
E.g:  8314,62001

optional_parameters.name: gender
optional_parameters.description:
Get from **/filters/gender** endpoint, data[index]->id
The gender is separated by a comma (if selecting multiple)
E.g:  1001,1000

optional_parameters.name: min_max_price
optional_parameters.description:
min_max_price must be numbers separated by commas, for example: 0,190

The maximum and minimum values are taken from the filters/price-range endpoint, data[index]->id

optional_parameters.name: filters
optional_parameters.description:
When searching for the first time, the response will include item facets.

**To apply filters, you input as follows:**

Please enter `facets->id=facets->facetValues->id`
Example: range=sale
If you want to input multiple filters for one facets->id, use a comma between the values.
Example: range=sale,new_season

If you want to filter multiple facets->id, use the ampersand (&) to separate the facets->id.
Example: range=sale,new_season**&**attribute_1047=8401,8406

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description:
Get `currency `item from `currencies `endpoint
Default: USD

optional_parameters.name: shop_in_code
optional_parameters.description:
`shopInCode` from `shop-in` endpoint

Default: US (United States)

optional_parameters.name: lang_code
optional_parameters.description:
`defaultLanguage` from `shop-in` endpoint (defaultLanguage belongs to shopInCode)

Default: en-US (United States)

optional_parameters.name: store_code
optional_parameters.description:
`storeCode` from `shop-in` endpoint (storeCode belongs to shopInCode)

Default: US

api_list.name: filters/activity

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description:
Input either the **key search** or the **category ID**
**Key search**:  Text search everything
**category ID**: categoryId from categories/list or categories/list-shortened endpoint

api_list.name: products/search-by-category
api_list.description: Search for products based on the  `category id`

optional_parameters.name: product_type
optional_parameters.description:
Get from **/filters/product-type** endpoint, data[index]->id
The product_type is separated by a comma (if selecting multiple)
E.g: 8606,8415

optional_parameters.name: color
optional_parameters.description:
Get from **/filters/color** endpoint, data[index]->id
The color is separated by a comma (if selecting multiple)
E.g: 4,17

optional_parameters.name: design
optional_parameters.description:
Get from **/filters/design** endpoint, data[index]->id
The design is separated by a comma (if selecting multiple)
E.g: 61375,61443

optional_parameters.name: gender
optional_parameters.description:
Get from **/filters/gender** endpoint, data[index]->id
The gender is separated by a comma (if selecting multiple)
E.g: 1001,1000

optional_parameters.name: range
optional_parameters.description:
Get from **/filters/range** endpoint, data[index]->id
The range is separated by a comma (if selecting multiple)
E.g: new_season,sale

optional_parameters.name: min_max_price
optional_parameters.description:
min_max_price must be numbers separated by commas, for example: 0,190

The maximum and minimum values are taken from the filters/price-range endpoint, data[index]->id

optional_parameters.name: activity
optional_parameters.description:
Get from **/filters/activity** endpoint, data[index]->id
The activity is separated by a comma (if selecting multiple)

optional_parameters.name: size

optional_parameters.name: brand

`storeCode` from `shop-in` endpoint (storeCode belongs to shopInCode)

Default: US

optional_parameters.name: lang_code
optional_parameters.description:
`defaultLanguage` from `shop-in` endpoint (defaultLanguage belongs to shopInCode)

Default: en-US (United States)

optional_parameters.name: filters
optional_parameters.description:
When searching for the first time, the response will include item facets.

**To apply filters, you input as follows:**

Please enter `facets->id=facets->facetValues->id`
Example: range=sale
If you want to input multiple filters for one facets->id, use a comma between the values.
Example: range=sale,new_season

If you want to filter multiple facets->id, use the ampersand (&) to separate the facets->id.
Example: range=sale,new_season**&**attribute_1047=8401,8406

optional_parameters.description:

api_list.name: products/detail

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: `url` of product from `products/search` or ` products/search-by-category` or `products/list-similarities` endpoint

optional_parameters.name: shop_in_code
optional_parameters.description:
`shopInCode` from `shop-in` endpoint

Default: US (United States)

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description:
Get `currency `item from `currencies `endpoint
Default: USD

api_list.name: shop-in
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://asos-com1.p.rapidapi.com/shop-in"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "asos-com1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://asos-com1.p.rapidapi.com/shop-in"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "asos-com1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
